definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

pinyin: song1 xia4 dian4 qi4 gong1 ye4

sentences.english: Known applications include electrical shunts which control and measure the actual current through devices.
sentences.chinese: 已知的应用有用于控制和测量电流的电气分流器。

sentences.english: The electrical connection in the photoelectrics levator involves electronics.
sentences.chinese: 光电升降机嗉的电气连接涉及到电子学。

sentences.english: Their inventions have contributed to the development of electrical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 他们的发明有助于电气工程学的发展。

sentences.english: Wire test is a key part in process of installing wire in electric box.
sentences.chinese: 线缆测试是电气柜线缆安装过程中十分重要的环节。

sentences.english: Advise some ideas to improve the current electric and gas system.
sentences.chinese: 对现行的电气系统提出改进意见。

sentences.english: GE said the charges are inaccurate.
sentences.chinese: 通用电气说，这些指控是错误的。

sentences.english: She told me I had fallen down an elevator shaft .
sentences.chinese: 磁性系统内部的电梯井的墙壁，没有正常的电气控制。

sentences.english: Charge curve and the electric parameter of battery measure up the nominal amount.
sentences.chinese: 充电曲线，电池各电气参数能够达到标称值。

sentences.english: The magnetic system is inside the walls of the elevator shaft , there are no normal electrical controls.
sentences.chinese: 磁性系统内部的电梯井的墙壁，没有正常的电气控制。

sentences.english: The paper presents a method to evaluate the reliability of bus configuration by the time sequential simulation.
sentences.chinese: 提出了用时序模拟法对电气主接线进行可靠性评估。

sentences.english: Supervise all depts. to correctly operate electric part of equipment in accordance with electric security regulation.
sentences.chinese: 监督各部门设备电气部分的安全规程，正确操作。

sentences.english: Electrical, Electronical, Computer and Systems Engineering.
sentences.chinese: 电气，电子，计算机与系统工程专业。

sentences.english: Compensating unit should be provided when wires thread through settlement joint and expansion joint of building.
sentences.chinese: 电气管线穿过建筑物的沉降和伸缩缝采用补偿装置。

sentences.english: I want to have an all-electric vehicle in my lifetime.
sentences.chinese: 我想要在我的生活中有一个全电气化的车。

sentences.english: It can be caused by an abnormality of the heart structure or of the electrical system of the heart.
sentences.chinese: 它可能造成的心脏结构或心脏的电气系统异常。

sentences.english: A major potential for cost saving lies in vehicles' electrical equipment.
sentences.chinese: 在降低成本方面，机车车辆电气装置中有很大潜力。

definition: chemical industry, abbr. of 化學工業|化学工业[hua4 xue2 gong1 ye4]/chemical engineering, abbr. of 化學工程|化学工程[hua4 xue2 gong1 cheng2]
fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
